data.Name: Beth Hartshorne
data.Bio: These songs tend to reflect Beth's travels. Both, literally, from the Yorkshire Moors to the Himalayas and, inwardly, exploring lifeâ€™s inner-landscapes. Brought up listening to Leonard Cohen, his authenticity and meditative stanzas have undoubtedly influenced her songwriting, but this has also been infused with more upbeat influences from indie, alternative, rock, and folk genres.
